author: Lumbud84
description: There is a large dial with a screen in the middle. The screen has a number corresponding to the angle it's pointing in. there is another screen in the bottom corner that has a random number between 0 and 359. Follow the steps to figure out what number the dial should be at, taking account for the direction you have to turn it in. Do this 4 times to disarm the module.
name: The Number Dial
